duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide strategic direction and leadership from the data front, enabling the team to embark on tasks with a strong data-oriented approach.
Assess and recommend appropriate tools and technologies that align with project goals and data needs.
Develop and deliver training sessions to enhance the team's data-related skills, empowering them to take on tasks independently.
Leverage deep understanding of Natural Language Processing to enhance project outcomes and drive innovative solutions.
Assist the team in defining and implementing data-driven solutions, offering guidance and expertise.
Embrace a combination of on-site and remote work, maintaining availability for team consultations.
Showcase proficiency in Python and have a solid grasp of the broader data science ecosystem.
Act as a Subject Matter Expert (SME), providing insights that drive project success and align with industry best practices.
Prioritize candidates with strong Python skills.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Data Science, or a related field (Master's preferred)
